channel.title: multi-tenancy on From 0.985mhz... to several Ghz
channel.description: Recent content in multi-tenancy on From 0.985mhz... to several Ghz

item.title: vSphere with Tanzu - Avi and Multiple Supervisors
item.description: In this post I will try to describe how to use the new NSX and Avi together integration in vSphere with Tanzu in combination with several Supervisor clusters using only 1 NSX manager cluster and 1 Avi controller cluster
